name: xorbi12i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3), wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w2, w3), wn(wb(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w2, w3), wn(wb(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w2, w3), wn(wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3))

|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w2, w3), wn(wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w1, w3)

|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wxo(w2, w3), wn(wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w1, w3)

|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w2, w3))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w1, w3)

comment: Equality property for XOR. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
